document.full_text: r. a. dickey left in the third inning with an injured right heel and foot, and the mets lost for the fourth time in five games.
document.title: cubs 9, mets 3: dickey (foot) and the mets (4 losses in 5 games) are limping
lines_and_colors: r. a. dickey left in the third inning with an injured right heel and foot, and the mets lost for the fourth time in five games.
